<!--Code-->
Code: ```3031 (0xBD7)```
<!--Text-->
Text: ```"Operation failed due to insufficient disk space."```
<!--AutoGenerated/-->
### Description
_There is currently no further description available._
### Example
_There is currently no code example available on how to reproduce error 3031. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to produce this error._

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // Foo can not be successfully invoked if PreFoo() is not
        // invoked previously. If Foo() is called like this, it will
        // generate an error 3031.
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```

### Resolution
_There is currently no code example available on how to remedy error 3031. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to remedy this error._

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // We call PreFoo() prior to calling Foo(). Now, we will
        // no longer experience error 3031.
        Db.PreFoo();
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```
